description:
Engineered to provide bite on hard snow and slopes. Traction rails on the decks and crampons underfoot make them stable when you're moving over rolling terrain and tackling ice or raincrust.

  • Tough UniBody™ plastic deck sheds snow and ice, and doesn't absorb moisture. Steel traction rails and brake bars provide secure grip on steep terrain or icy conditions
  • Paraglide™ binding has stretch mesh to hold the foot securely without pressure points
  • Binding straps are easy to use, even when wearing gloves
  • Accepts MSR 6in. modular tails to add additional flotation for heavier loads and less supportive snow
name: MSR Evo Trail Snowshoes - Unisex
